Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Grants a personal income tax deduction to taxpayers with a terminal illness who withdraw up to $20,000 from their 401(k) account on a hardship basis
Summary: Grants a personal income tax deduction to taxpayers with a terminal illness who withdraw up to $20,000 from their 401(k) account on a hardship basis.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax deduction for certain withdrawals from a 401(k) plan by a taxpayer suffering from a terminal illness
